title: Problem rendering ignition with catkin workspace

content.raw:
I have a fresh installed a 18.04 machine, and followed the instructions for  Catkin workspace setup: #!/osrf/subt/wiki/tutorials/SystemSetupInstall

Ignition is not able to render properly, see the attached image.

```
The output of nvidia-smi is:
+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| NVIDIA-SMI 430.26       Driver Version: 430.26       CUDA Version: 10.2     |
|-------------------------------+----------------------+----------------------+
| GPU  Name        Persistence-M| Bus-Id        Disp.A | Volatile Uncorr. ECC |
| Fan  Temp  Perf  Pwr:Usage/Cap|         Memory-Usage | GPU-Util  Compute M. |
|===============================+======================+======================|
|   0  GeForce RTX 2060    Off  | 00000000:01:00.0  On |                  N/A |
|  0%   50C    P8    20W / 170W |   2513MiB /  5931MiB |     30%      Default |
+-------------------------------+----------------------+----------------------+
                                                                               
+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| Processes:                                                       GPU Memory |
|  GPU       PID   Type   Process name                             Usage      |
|=============================================================================|
|    0      1732      G   /usr/lib/xorg/Xorg                            16MiB |
|    0      1767      G   /usr/bin/gnome-shell                          50MiB |
|    0      2424      G   /usr/lib/xorg/Xorg                            90MiB |
|    0      2565      G   /usr/bin/gnome-shell                          92MiB |
|    0      6508      G   /usr/bin/ruby                                731MiB |
|    0      7075      G   /usr/bin/ruby                                731MiB |
|    0      7080      G   /usr/bin/ruby                                796MiB |
+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------+

```
content.html:
I have a fresh installed a 18.04 machine, and followed the instructions for Catkin workspace setup: #!/osrf/subt/wiki/tutorials/SystemSetupInstall

Ignition is not able to render properly, see the attached image.

The output of nvidia-smi is:
+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| NVIDIA-SMI 430.26       Driver Version: 430.26       CUDA Version: 10.2     |
|-------------------------------+----------------------+----------------------+
| GPU  Name        Persistence-M| Bus-Id        Disp.A | Volatile Uncorr. ECC |
| Fan  Temp  Perf  Pwr:Usage/Cap|         Memory-Usage | GPU-Util  Compute M. |
|===============================+======================+======================|
|   0  GeForce RTX 2060    Off  | 00000000:01:00.0  On |                  N/A |
|  0%   50C    P8    20W / 170W |   2513MiB /  5931MiB |     30%      Default |
+-------------------------------+----------------------+----------------------+

+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| Processes:                                                       GPU Memory |
|  GPU       PID   Type   Process name                             Usage      |
|=============================================================================|
|    0      1732      G   /usr/lib/xorg/Xorg                            16MiB |
|    0      1767      G   /usr/bin/gnome-shell                          50MiB |
|    0      2424      G   /usr/lib/xorg/Xorg                            90MiB |
|    0      2565      G   /usr/bin/gnome-shell                          92MiB |
|    0      6508      G   /usr/bin/ruby                                731MiB |
|    0      7075      G   /usr/bin/ruby                                731MiB |
|    0      7080      G   /usr/bin/ruby                                796MiB |
